verbose_text: Then, the protein expression levels of MAPK7, c-Fos, c-Myc, CREB and p-CREB were assessed by western blotting (XREF_FIG) MAPK7 protein expression in the overexpression group was considerably lower compared with the normal, silenced and control groups (P < 0.05).
evidence: levels of MAPK7, c-Fos, c-Myc, CREB and p-CREB
